SEARCH
Package env.objects.structures

Class BreakableStructure

java.lang.Object
env.objects.structures.MapStructure
env.objects.structures.BreakableStructure
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gate, Tree
public class BreakableStructure extends MapStructure
Represents a breakable structure on the map, such as a gate or a wall. Extends the MapStructure class and adds functionality for tracking damage and repairs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new BreakableStructure with the specified properties.

  • Constructor Details

    • BreakableStructure

      public BreakableStructure(String name, boolean repairable, boolean walkable, int maxLife, Boolean team, Pose pose)
      Constructs a new BreakableStructure with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the structure.
      repairable - true if the structure can be repaired, false otherwise.
      walkable - true if agents can walk through the structure (when it satisfies some conditions), false otherwise.
      maxLife - the maximum hit points of the structure.
      team - the team this structure belongs to (can be null for neutral structures).
      pose - the initial position and orientation of the structure.

  • Method Details

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      Checks if the structure is destroyed (hit points are zero).
      Returns:
      true if the structure is destroyed, false otherwise.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Inflicts damage to the structure. Reduces the structure's hit points by the specified amount, but does not allow hit points to fall below zero.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to inflict.

    • repair

      public void repair()
      Repairs the structure, restoring its hit points to the maximum value. Only effective if the structure is repairable and currently destroyed.
